title: New: Kyson – Soul Person
body:
As if I haven’t ranted and raved enough about Australia recently, Adelaide by way of Berlin electronic producer **Kyson** gives me further reason to fall in love with Oz.

His recent release **_Blackstone_** is a coherent collection of majestic and soulful recordings, fusing ambient soundscapes with more contemporary influences and strikingly soft vocals. Highlight _Soul Person_ toys with crescendoes and silences, reinvigorating the oft derisory chillwave tag to fantastical effect. Check it out below and grab the full release out now via [Moodgadget Records](http://www.beatport.com/release/blackstone/984407).
